title: L39ion of Los Angeles settles #critbeef at USA Crits Tulsa Tough
content:
If you’re a fan of high-stakes bike racing — this weekend was a gift from the cycling gods, with XCO World Cups and the return to UCI DH racing for the mountain crowd and USA Crits Tulsa Tough for the road crowd. We’re here to talk about the latter, more specifically #critbeef, and the utter […]

The post L39ion of Los Angeles settles #critbeef at USA Crits Tulsa Tough appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
